bwwExcerpt: "Still, "Born Yesterday," at 65, need not be retired. It still works when there is the right chemistry among the three principal actors. (It is a measure of how old this play is that its cast numbers 15: hotel staff, advisers, the senator and his wife.) Both Jim Belushi and Robert Sean Leonard are playing familiar characters for them - Belushi (now star of the TV show "The Defenders") brash, easily annoyed; Leonard (best-known now for "House") intelligent and
